lore: It is a common misconception that the power of the Basilisks is contained in their eyeballs. A study carried out in the Refuge of the Magi confirmed that their powers still worked after removing their eyes.\n\nThe Dormant Basilisk has great regenerative abilities: even if they lose their tail or an arm, they grow back in a matter of seconds. Potions that contain hair of this creature are commonly sold on the black market. The most frequent effect after ingesting these products is acute diarrhea.
menagerieDialog: (It's crouched down, staring blankly into nothingness.)
(It's busy eating a fish. Any time someone comes too close to it, it growls protectively.)
(It's sniffing in deep gulps of air, perhaps in search of food.)
(It burps up a boot. You don't even want to know who it once belonged to.)
(It bows its head and turns away. It must be shy.)
name: Dormant Basilisk
